short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notify you when a video you're watching on YouTube is available on Floatplane.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch on Floatplane is a chrome extension that lets you easily switch from YouTube to Floatplane, a premium video platform that offers exclusive content from popular YouTube channels.

Watch on Floatplane adds a small icon to the YouTube video player that shows you if the video is also available on Floatplane. If it is, you can click on the icon and watch it there with no ads and at higher quality.

Watch on Floatplane is not affiliated with YouTube or Floatplane, and requires a valid Floatplane account to watch the videos.
